set.name: DM-23 The End of the Universe

property.name: Race
property.value: Tyranno Drake

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bio Kick - When a Tyranno Drake you control attacks a player and is not blocked, you may discard this card fromyour hand. If so, choose any number of opponent's creatures with total power of 3000, and destroy them. Double Breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution GV - Arc Seraphim, Dreammate, and/or Great Mecha King [Triple Breaker] [Blocker] When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. From there you may summon any number of creatures without paying their cost. Afterward, put the rest of the cards into your Graveyard.

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution GV - Grand Devil, Tyranno Drake, and/or Deep Marine [Triple Breaker] When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, put all cards under Evolution creatures into their owner's Graveyard. [Great Life Gate: Grand Devil, Tyranno Drake, Deep Marine, Brave Spirit] (When this creature is destroyed, you may return all Grand Devil, Tyranno Drake, Deep Marine, and Brave Spirit from your Graveyard to your hand. If so, put this creature on the bottom of your deck.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Poseidia Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Dragon [Thrilling Three: Dragon] Search your deck for a card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck. Double Breaker

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Apollonia Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Dragon [Double Breaker] When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, you may choose up to 2 opponent's creature in the Battle Zone and tap them. Meteorburn - When this creature attacks, put a card under this creature into your Graveyard. If you do, you may choose up to 2 opponent's creatures in the Battle Zone and tap them.

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Great Mecha King

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Great Mecha King [Double Breaker] [Blocker] When this creature blocks, after the battle, untap this creature. Meteorburn - When this creature would leave the Battle Zone, you may choose a card under this creature and put it into the Graveyard. If so, this creature remains in the Battle Zone.

property.name: Race
property.value: Great Mecha King

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, look at your Shields. You may put one of them into your Graveyard.If so, put the top card of your deck into your Shields face-down. [Life Gate: Great Mecha King] Double Breaker

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Zombie Dragon/Tyranno Drake

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Zombie Dragon or Tyranno Drake [Double Breaker] When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, if you put it on top of a Tyranno Drake, choose a card from your opponent's hand and discard it. When this creature attacks, if the card under this creature is a Dragon, destroy an opponent's untapped creature.

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Dragon/Tyranno Drake

property.name: Rules
property.value: When opponent plays a Spell, return this card from the Battle Zone to your hand. Double Breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bio Kick - When a Dreammate you control attacks and is not blocked, you may discard this card from your hand. If so, search your deck for a creature with the same name as the attacking creature, reveal it and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Race
property.value: Saint Head

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Shield trigger] Shield Trigger (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, you may tap an opponent's creature for each Arc Seraphim you control in the Battle Zone.

property.name: Race
property.value: Apollonia Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature wins a battle, you may search your deck for a Dragon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck.

property.name: Race
property.value: Great Mecha King

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Life Gate: Great Mecha King or Machine Hero] (When this creature is destroyed, you may return a Great Mecha King or Machine Hero, or one of each, from your Graveyard to your hand. If you do, put this creature on the bottom of your deck instead of the Graveyard.)

property.name: Race
property.value: Machine Hero

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, look at a number of cards from the top of your deck equal to the number of Great Mecha King you control in the Battle Zone. From there put a card into your hand, and return the rest to the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Race
property.value: Grand Devil

property.name: Rules
property.value: When an opponent uses a "Shield Trigger" ability, you may draw up to 2 cards.

property.name: Race
property.value: Liquid People

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bio Tackle - When a Liquid People you control attacks, at the beginning of the Battle, you may discard this card from your hand. If so, until the end the turn, all attacking creatures you control gain Power +1000 for each card in your hand.

property.name: Race
property.value: Deep Marine

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, until end of turn, all of your opponent's tapped creatures gain Power -1000 for each Grand Devil you control in the Battle Zone.

property.name: Race
property.value: Zombie Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, discard a card from your hand. [Life Gate: Dragon] Double Breaker

property.name: Race
property.value: Tyranno Drake

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your opponent uses a Shield they control, they choose and discard a card from their hand.

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Tyranno Drake

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Tyranno Drake All creatures you control in the Battle Zone gain "Speed Attacker". During the end of your turn, return all other creatures you control in the Battle Zone to your hand. Double Breaker

property.name: Race
property.value: Brave Spirit

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, you may destroy an opponent's creature with power 2000 or less for each Tyranno Drake you control in the Battle Zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Life Gate: Dreammate or Vehicle Bee] (When this creature is destroyed, you may return a Dreammate or Vehicle Bee, or one of each, from your Graveyard to your hand. If so, put this creature on the bottom of your deck instead of the Graveyard.)

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Dreammate When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, you may choose an opponent's Evolution Creature and put it into its owner's Mana Zone.

property.name: Race
property.value: Vehicle Bee

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, you may put a card from the top of your deck into your Mana Zone for each Dreammate you control in the Battle Zone.

property.name: Race
property.value: Arc Seraphim

property.name: Rules
property.value: When your opponent uses a "Shield Trigger" ability, you may put the top card from your deck into your Mana Zone.

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution - Put on one of your Guardian When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, your opponent chooses a creature type. When battling with creature outside of the chosen type, your creatures gain Power +6000.

property.name: Race
property.value: Great Mecha King

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, look at 3 of your Shields. You may choose a Machine Hero with cost 3 or less and put it into your Battle Zone. If so, put the top card from your deck into Shields face-down.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] This creature cannot attack players. Whenever a card in your mana zone is put into the graveyard by an opponent, you may return that card to your mana zone.

property.name: Race
property.value: Poseidia Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is destroyed, return it to your hand instead of putting it into the Graveyard. Double Breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Race
property.value: Great Mecha King

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bio Kick - When a Great Mecha King you control attacks and is not blocked, you may discard this card from your hand. If so, you may draw up to 2 cards.

property.name: Race
property.value: Grand Devil

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, look at the top 3 cards of your deck. From there, you may put a Deep Marine that costs 3 or less into the Battle Zone, and return the rest to the top of your deck in any order.

property.name: Race
property.value: Grand Devil

property.name: Rules
property.value: During your opponent's turn, when a Grand Devil you control is destroyed, choose an opponent's Shield and put it into its owner's Graveyard.

property.name: Race
property.value: Grand Devil

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bio Kick - When a Grand Devil you control attacks and is not blocked, you may discard this card from your hand. If so, your attacking creatures gain "Double Breaker" until end of turn.

property.name: Race
property.value: Tyranno Drake

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, you may return a Brave Spirit with a cost of 3 or less from your Graveyard to your Battle Zone.

property.name: Race
property.value: Armored Dragon

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature gains Power +2000 for each Fire Bird you control in the Battle Zone. When you control a Fire Bird in the Battle Zone, this creature gains "Double Breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, you may destroy a Saint Head, Deep Marine, Brave Spirit, or Machine Hero with a cost of 3 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Speed Attacker] At the end of your turn, destroy this creature. Life Gate: Human (When this creature is destroyed, you may return a Human from your Graveyard to your hand instead. If so, put this creature on the bottom of your deck instead of the Graveyard.)

property.name: Race
property.value: Arc Seraphim

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, you may move a Saint Head with a cost of 3 or less from your Mana Zone to the Battle Zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Evolution creatures of any type can be put on the top of this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, each player puts the top card from their deck into their ManaZone. [Life Gate: Dreammate]

property.name: Rules
property.value: [Blocker] This creature cannot attack players. Life Gate: Guardian (When this creature is destroyed, you may return a Guardian from your Graveyard to your hand. If so, put this creature on the bottom of your deck instead of the Graveyard.)

property.name: Race
property.value: Arc Seraphim

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bio Kick - When a Grand Devil you control attacks and is not blocked, you may discard this card from your hand. If so, return 2 Light Spells from your Graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Race
property.value: Great Mecha King

property.name: Rules
property.value: Life Gate: Great Mecha King (When this creature is destroyed, you may return a Great Mecha King from your Graveyard to your hand. If so, put this creature on the bottom of your deck instead of the Graveyard.)

property.name: Race
property.value: Great Mecha King

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bio Tackle - When a Great Mecha King you control attacks, at the beginning of the Battle, you may discard this card from your hand. If so, until the end of turn, all attacking creatures you control gain Power +1500. Untap all of the attacking creatures at the end of the turn.

property.name: Race
property.value: Grand Devil

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bio Tackle - When a Grand Devil you control attacks, at the beginning of the Battle, you may discard this card from your hand. If so, return the creature that the Grand Devil is attacking to its owner's hand.

property.name: Race
property.value: Great Mecha King

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.)

property.value: Life Gate: Grand Devil (When this creature is destroyed, you may return a Grand Devil from your Graveyard to yourhand. If so, put this creature on the bottom of your deck instead of the Graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, choose any number of cards in your opponent's Graveyard and put them on the bottom of their deck in any order.

property.value: When a Tyranno Drake or Brave Spirit you control attacks and is not blocked, your opponent chooses a card from his/her handand discards it.

property.value: Bio Tackle - When a Tyranno Drake you control attacks, at the beginning of the Battle, you may discard this card from your hand. If so, until the end of turn, your attacking creatures gain "Slayer".

property.value: Death Puppet

property.name: Rules
property.value: When this creature is put into the Battle Zone, destroy a creature you control. Life Gate: Death Puppet (When this creature is destroyed, you may return a Death Puppet from your Graveyard to your hand. If so, put this creature on the bottom of your deck instead of the Graveyard.)

property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Life Gate: Arc Seraphim (When this creature is destroyed, you may return an Arc Seraphim from your Graveyard to your hand. If so, put this creature on the bottom of your deck instead of the Graveyard.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Bio Tackle - When an Arc Seraphim you control attacks, at the beginning of the Battle, you may discard this card from your hand. If so, until the end of turn, your attacking creatures gain Power +2000.
